name: ARBC
description: Albit, a full chain space exploration and adventure game created by the parent company of B A Y C and in collaboration with the ARBT community, is a wandering planet. Players can establish their own base, create hero generals, and expand their territory in the binary universe planet. The token ARBC has been launched on exchanges such as Matcha, Bitter, and Bitget in November, with a conservative tenfold starting point. To participate in online gaming and make a deposit, you need to exchange ARBT for purchasing ARBC. The initial deposit income will double in a few days.
